forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers this afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning giving way to a few showers late. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds NE at 15 to 30 km/h. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds NE at 10 to 20 mph. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 37F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later in the day. High near 15C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny in the morning then increasing clouds with showers later in the day. High 62F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High near 65F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 19C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 69F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 66F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 2C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
